full_summary:
### TBIPS - Infrastructure Services for Desktop Modernization and Endpoint Management Services

#### Solicitation Number: 24-247559

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requests proposals for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) for the provision of infrastructure services in support of the Desktop Modernization and Endpoint Management Services.

The solicitation is open to eligible candidates under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement who have completed the necessary qualifications for services in the National Capital Region. The requirement is categorized as Secret Security Level, and the expected contract duration is twelve (12) months, with two (2) possible option periods of 12 months each.

#### Mandatory Requirements:

* The services must be provided at the Secret Security Level
* The contractor must have a minimum Corporate Security Level of Secret
* The contractor must have a minimum Resource Security Level of Secret

#### Description of Work:

DFATD requires resources with expertise in architecture services to contribute to the IM/IT transformation initiatives for the Desktop Modernization program. These services include:

* Providing a holistic and integrated view of core/foundational IT evolution
* Integrating the technology backbone to deliver current services while preparing for future needs
* Ensuring DFATD has up-to-date, easy-to-access, and easy-to-use foundational systems
* Reducing the risk associated with modernization, replacement, and upgrades

#### Invitation to Bid:

The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Cofomo Ottawa
* Coradix Technology Consulting Ltd.
* Donna Cona Inc.
* eVision Inc., SoftSim Technologies Inc. (Joint Venture)
* Makwa Resourcing Inc., TPG Technology Consulting Ltd. (Joint Venture)
* MERAK Systems Corporation
* Mindwire Systems Ltd.
* MNP LLP
* OLAV Consulting Corp., MOSHWA Aboriginal Information Technology Corporation (Joint Venture)
* Paralucent Inc.
* Randstad Interim Inc.
* SRA Staffing Solutions Ltd.
* Talentlab Inc.
* TEKSYSTEMS Canada Corp./Société TEKSYSTEMS Canada
* Unisys Canada Inc.

#### Contracting Authority:

Betty Woodman can be reached at (343) 203-6922 or betty.woodman@international.gc.ca for any questions regarding the solicitation.

#### Closing Date:

2023-09-19, at 14:00:00. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
